longBusinessSummary: MSP Steel & Power Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells iron and steel products in India and internationally. The company provides TMT bars, MS billets, sponge iron, and pellets; structural steel products, including beams, channels, angles, and round bars for industrial, infrastructural, engineering, domestic, and agricultural sectors; and value-added products; as well as job work services. It also offers various pipes, such as black steel, and square and rectangular hollow sections black pipes for water pipelines, agriculture and irrigation, gas pipe lines, chemical, construction, fire fighting system and air-conditioning, and other sectors. In addition, the company engages in the power generation business; and sale of scrap and by-products. MSP Steel & Power Limited was incorporated in 1968 and is based in Kolkata, India.
